property.name: backend
property.description: Authentication backend. Common settings are: django.contrib.auth.backends.ModelBackend,desktop.auth.backend.AllowAllBackend,desktop.auth.backend.AllowFirstUserDjangoBackend,desktop.auth.backend.LdapBackend,desktop.auth.backend.PamBackend,desktop.auth.backend.SpnegoDjangoBackend,desktop.auth.backend.RemoteUserDjangoBackend,libsaml.backend.SAML2Backend,libopenid.backend.OpenIDBackend,liboauth.backend.OAuthBackend. Multiple Authentication backends are supported by specifying a comma-separated list in order of priority. However, in order to enable OAuthBackend, it must be the ONLY backend configured

property.name: user_aug
property.description: Class which defines extra accessor methods for User objects

property.name: pam_service
property.description: The service to use when querying PAM

property.name: remote_user_header
property.description: When using the desktop.auth.backend.RemoteUserDjangoBackend, this sets the normalized name of the header that contains the remote user. The HTTP header in the request is converted to a key by converting all characters to uppercase, replacing any hyphens with underscores and adding an HTTP_ prefix to the name. So, for example, if the header is called Remote-User that would be configured as HTTP_REMOTE_USER. Defaults to HTTP_REMOTE_USER

property.name: ignore_username_case
property.description: Ignore the case of usernames when searching for existing users. Supported in remoteUserDjangoBackend and SpnegoDjangoBackend

property.name: force_username_lowercase
property.description: Forcibly cast usernames to lowercase, takes precedence over force_username_uppercase, Supported in remoteUserDjangoBackend and SpnegoDjangoBackend

property.name: force_username_uppercase
property.description: Forcibly cast usernames to uppercase, cannot be combined with force_username_lowercase

property.name: expires_after
property.description: Users will expire after they have not logged in for 'n' amount of seconds. A negative number means that users will never expire

property.name: idle_session_timeout
property.description: Users will automatically be logged out after 'n' seconds of inactivity. A negative number means that idle sessions will not be timed out.

property.name: change_default_password
property.description: Force users to change password on first login with desktop.auth.backend.AllowFirstUserDjangoBackend

property.name: login_failure_limit
property.description: Number of login attempts allowed before a record is created for failed logins

property.name: login_lock_out_at_failure
property.description: After number of allowed login attempts are exceeded, do we lock out this IP and optionally user agent?

property.name: login_cooloff_time
property.description: If set, defines period of inactivity in seconds after which failed logins will be forgotten

property.name: login_lock_out_use_user_agent
property.display-name: Login Lock Out Use User Agent
property.description: If True, lock out based on an IP address AND a user agent.This means requests from different user agents but from the same IP are treated differently.

property.name: login_lock_out_by_combination_user_and_ip
property.display-name: Login Lock Out By Combination User and IP
property.description: If True, lock out based on IP and user

property.name: behind_reverse_proxy
property.description: If True, it will look for the IP address from the header defined at reverse_proxy_header.

property.name: reverse_proxy_header
property.description: If behind_reverse_proxy is True, it will look for the IP address from this header. Default: HTTP_X_FORWARDED_FOR
